revised_title: The Correlation between Abdominal Pores and Nephrostomes in Elasmobranch Fishes
tldr: The author investigates the correlation between abdominal pores and nephrostomes in elasmobranch fishes, finding that these two sets of organs are often present in the same species. The study provides a comprehensive account of the distribution of both nephrostomes and abdominal pores among adult elasmobranchs, suggesting that the body cavity of these fish is never completely enclosed by the peritoneum.
